external_references.source_name: Trend Micro Mustang Panda Earth Preta Toneshell February 2025
external_references.description: Nathaniel Morales, Nick Dai. (2025, February 18). Earth Preta Mixes Legitimate and Malicious Components to Sidestep Detection. Retrieved September 10, 2025.

objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has leveraged legitimate software installer executables such as Setup Factory “IRSetup.exe” to drop and execute their payload.(Citation: Trend Micro Mustang Panda Earth Preta Toneshell February 2025)
